pageContent:
VIKRAM ANTIL 
U-50/26, DLF - Phase 3, Gurugram – 122010 • (+91) 9813033666 
vikramantil283@gmail.com • LinkedIn Profile 
 
Summary: 
 
Proactive and detail-oriented Android Developer with 3.6 years of experience in designing, developing, 
and maintaining high-quality Android applications. Expertise in Java, Kotlin, MVVM, Retrofit, Android 
SDK, DI  and Coroutines. Recognized for strong problem-solving abilities, effective communication, 
and commitment to achieving project goals with operational efficiency. 
Highlights 
 
- Developed and maintained high-quality Android applications 
- Integrated third-party libraries and APIs to enhance app functionality 
- Implemented efficient solutions for offline storage, threading, and performance tuning 
- Contributed to the successful delivery of multiple high-impact projects 
- Recognized for maintaining code quality and ensuring best performance and responsiveness 
Technical Skills: 
 Programming Languages: Java, Kotlin

- Recognized for maintaining code quality and ensuring best performance and responsiveness 
Technical Skills: 
 Programming Languages: Java, Kotlin 
 Architecture: MVVM, MVC, MVP 
 Testing: Espresso (Unit and UI Test Cases) 
 Databases: SQLite, Room Database 
 Network Libraries: Retrofit, Volley, OkHttp, RX Java 
 Other Tools: Coroutines, FCM, Razor Pay 
 Android SDK: Strong understanding of various versions and handling different screen sizes 
 Additional Skills: Offline storage, threading, performance tuning, third-party library 
integration 
 
 
Professional Experience: 
 
Dhwani Rural Information System Pvt. Ltd. 
Android Developer (08/2022 - Present) 
 Translated design specifications into high-quality Android application frames. 
 Created databases using SQLite and Room Database for offline storage. 
 Managed API services to ensure accurate and efficient results. 
 Fixed bugs and customized applications for client-specific needs.

 Managed API services to ensure accurate and efficient results. 
 Fixed bugs and customized applications for client-specific needs. 
 Ensured optimal performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. 
 Maintained high code quality for organizational benefits and automation.

RapidSoft Technologies Pvt. Ltd. 
Android Developer (02/2021 - 08/2022) 
 Developed and maintained various Android applications. 
 Integrated product flavors for different clients. 
 Implemented push notifications using FCM. 
 Integrated Razor Pay for payment processing. 
 Worked on vehicle tracking apps, ERP systems, and government projects. 
 Provided customization and support for client application. 
Projects: 
TATA MHM (App Link) 
Developed a data collection and KYC updating app for ground-level use. Improved data accuracy and 
processing time by 30%. 
TATA JJM  (App Link) 
Created a government app for the Water Mission to facilitate form filling and surveys on village water 
conditions. Successfully deployed to over 1000 users with positive feedback on usability. 
WTracker  (App Link) 
Designed an app for vehicle tracking with features like GPS installation, live tracking, and push

WTracker  (App Link) 
Designed an app for vehicle tracking with features like GPS installation, live tracking, and push 
notifications for ignition, parking, and overspeed alerts. Enhanced vehicle tracking efficiency by 40%. 
ClientERP  (App Link) 
Developed an ERP sales system using product flavors, provided to over 35 clients. Key components 
included attendance and payslip management, background location tracking, leave management, and 
geofencing. Increased client productivity by 25% through streamlined processes. 
 
 
Education: 
B.Tech in Computer Science 
DCRUST University, 6.13 CGPA (2015-2019) 
12th in PCM

CBSE Board, 8.0 CGPA (2013)
